    • Method Detail

      • fromSeedPhrase

        public static ConcordiumHdWallet fromSeedPhrase(String seedPhrase,
                                                Network network)
                                         throws IOException,
                                                org.bitcoinj.crypto.MnemonicException
        Create a Concordium hierarchical deterministic wallet from a space separated seed phrase. It is in general safer to use the method that takes a list of strings as input as it is less error prone than using this method.
        Parameters:
        seedPhrase - the seed phrase with words separated by a single space
        network - the network the wallet is for
        Returns:
        a wallet that can derive required Concordium wallet keys
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.bitcoinj.crypto.MnemonicException

      • fromSeedPhrase

        public static ConcordiumHdWallet fromSeedPhrase(List<String> seedPhrase,
                                                Network network)
                                         throws IOException,
                                                org.bitcoinj.crypto.MnemonicException
        Create a Concordium hierarchical deterministic wallet from a seed phrase provided as a list of strings.
        Parameters:
        seedPhrase - the seed phrase with words separated by a single space
        network - the network the wallet is for
        Returns:
        a wallet that can derive required Concordium wallet keys
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.bitcoinj.crypto.MnemonicException

      • fromHex

        public static ConcordiumHdWallet fromHex(String seedAsHex,
                                         Network network)
        Create a Concordium hierarchical deterministic wallet from a seed.
        Parameters:
        seedAsHex - the seed encoded as a hex string. Must be 128 characters.
        network - the network the wallet is for.
        Returns:
        a wallet that can derive required Concordium wallet keys

      • getAccountSigningKey

        public ED25519SecretKey getAccountSigningKey(int identityProviderIndex,
                                             int identityIndex,
                                             int credentialCounter)
        Derives an account signing key. This is the key used to sign account transactions.
        Parameters:
        identityProviderIndex - the index of the identity provider interpreted as a u32.
        identityIndex - the index of the identity interpreted as a u32.
        credentialCounter - the credential number that the signing key is for interpreted as a u32.
        Returns:
        an account signing key.

      • getAccountPublicKey

        public ED25519PublicKey getAccountPublicKey(int identityProviderIndex,
                                            int identityIndex,
                                            int credentialCounter)
        Derives an account public key. This is the public key that matches the account signing key.
        Parameters:
        identityProviderIndex - the index of the identity provider interpreted as a u32.
        identityIndex - the index of the identity interpreted as a u32.
        credentialCounter - the credential number that the signing key is for interpreted as a u32.
        Returns:
        an account public key.

      • getIdCredSec

        public BLSSecretKey getIdCredSec(int identityProviderIndex,
                                 int identityIndex)
        Derives id cred sec for a specific identity.
        Parameters:
        identityProviderIndex - the index of the identity provider interpreted as a u32.
        identityIndex - the index of the identity interpreted as a u32.
        Returns:
        id cred sec

      • getPrfKey

        public BLSSecretKey getPrfKey(int identityProviderIndex,
                              int identityIndex)
        Derives the PRF key for a specific identity.
        Parameters:
        identityProviderIndex - the index of the identity provider interpreted as a u32.
        identityIndex - the index of the identity interpreted as a u32.
        Returns:
        a PRF key

      • getCredentialId

        public String getCredentialId(int identityProviderIndex,
                              int identityIndex,
                              int credentialCounter,
                              String commitmentKey)
        Gets the credential ID for a specific credential defined by the identity provider index, identity index and the credential counter.
        Parameters:
        identityProviderIndex - the index of the identity provider interpreted as a u32.
        identityIndex - the index of the identity interpreted as a u32.
        credentialCounter - the credential number of the credential to get the id for interpreted as a u8.
        commitmentKey - the on chain commitment key. This value can be retrieved from a node through its gRPC interface.
        Returns:
        the credential id

      • getSignatureBlindingRandomness

        public String getSignatureBlindingRandomness(int identityProviderIndex,
                                             int identityIndex)
        Derives the signature blinding randomness for a specific identity.
        Parameters:
        identityProviderIndex - the index of the identity provider interpreted as a u32.
        identityIndex - the index of the identity interpreted as a u32.
        Returns:
        the signature blinding randomness as a hex encoded string

      • getAttributeCommitmentRandomness

        public String getAttributeCommitmentRandomness(int identityProviderIndex,
                                               int identityIndex,
                                               int credentialCounter,
                                               int attribute)
        Derives the attribute commitment randomness for a specific attribute.
        Parameters:
        identityProviderIndex - the index of the identity provider interpreted as a u32.
        identityIndex - the index of the identity interpreted as a u32.
        credentialCounter - the credential number that the attribute is randomness is for interpreted as a u32.
        attribute - the attribute key index interpreted as a u8.
        Returns:
        the signature blinding randomness as a hex encoded string

      • getVerifiableCredentialSigningKey

        public ED25519SecretKey getVerifiableCredentialSigningKey(ContractAddress issuer,
                                                          int verifiableCredentialIndex)
        Derives a verifiable credential signing key.
        Parameters:
        issuer - the verifiable credential issuer contract
        verifiableCredentialIndex - the index of the verifiable credential to derive a signing key for interpreted as a u32
        Returns:
        a verifiable credential signing key

      • getVerifiableCredentialPublicKey

        public ED25519PublicKey getVerifiableCredentialPublicKey(ContractAddress issuer,
                                                         int verifiableCredentialIndex)
        Derives a verifiable credential public key.
        Parameters:
        issuer - the verifiable credential issuer contract
        verifiableCredentialIndex - the index of the verifiable credential to derive a public key for interpreted as a u32
        Returns:
        a verifiable credential public key

      • getVerifiableCredentialBackupEncryptionKey

        public String getVerifiableCredentialBackupEncryptionKey()
        Derives the verifiable credential backup encryption key. This key should be used to encrypt the backup file of verifiable credentials. The key is derived from the seed phrase so that a user can access the backup file when only holding the seed phrase.
        Returns:
        the verifiable credential backup encryption key
